translations: 不反射的；不反省的；浅薄的；无思想的

sentences.sentence: "Not choice, but habit rules the unreflecting herd," William Wordsworth said in the 19th century.
sentences.translation: “并非选择，而是习惯会控制那些没有思想的人。”19世纪时，威廉·华兹华斯说。

sentences.sentence: Not choice, but habit rules the unreflecting herd. "William Wordsworth said in the 19th century."
sentences.translation: 19世纪，威廉华兹华斯曾说：“真正掌控了那些缺乏思考的人的不是选择而是习惯。”

sentences.sentence: You will not think I have presumed upon your defencelessness - been too quick and unreflecting, will you?
sentences.translation: 你不会以为我在你没有防备时太鲁莽吧？ ——我来得太快，也没有想一想，你会不会？
